title: Bahrain Three Month Interbank Rate
description: Bahrain Three Month Interbank Rate was at 5.72 percent on Wednesday November 9. Interbank Rate in Bahrain averaged 2.20 percent from 2006 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 5.72 percent in November of 2022 and a record low of 1 percent in November of 2014. The interbank rate is the rate of interest charged on short-term loans made between banks in the local currency. This page provides - Bahrain Interbank Rate- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Bank of Bahrain
